how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Shake can extremely well for maximum cleaning results..-Hold can six to 6 - 10 inches away from dry, dirty hair..-Section and apply product in a sweeping motion..-Wait 30 seconds for powders to activate and cleanse..-Remove powder by massaging and shaking at roots with fingers, or by brushing hair..-Apply more product as needed, shaking can again..-Style as desired.         . .Recycling Instructions:.-This product is recyclable through TerraCycle.
